tossup_question: 30) PHYSICS  What elementary particle is the carrier of the electromagnetic force?
tossup_MCQoptions:
W) Electron 
X) Gluon
Y) Photon 
Z) Neutrino
bonus_question: 30) PHYSICS  A square conducting loop of length L on a side carries a current. Which of the following best characterizes the magnetic field at the center of the loop?
bonus_MCQoptions:
W) Independent of L
X) Inversely proportional to L 
Y) Proportional to L2
Z) Proportional to L
bonus_answer: ANSWER: X) Inversely proportional to L
